description.brazilian: Derrote o "Artilheiro"!
description.english: Beat "The Gunner"!
description.french: Vainquez "l'Artilleur" !
description.german: Töte den "Kanonier"!
description.italian: Sconfiggi "Il Cannoniere"!
description.japanese: 「ガンナー」を倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj "Strzelca"!
description.spanish: ¡Vence al "Pistolero"!

description.brazilian: Derrote o "Supervisor"!
description.english: Beat "The Overseer"!
description.french: Vainquez "le Surveillant" !
description.german: Töte den "Aufseher"!
description.italian: Sconfiggi "Il Supervisore"!
description.japanese: 「オーバーシアー」を倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj "Nadzorcę"!
description.spanish: ¡Vence al "Supervisor"!

description.brazilian: Derrote o "Carniceiro"!
description.english: Beat "The Butcher"!
description.french: Vainquez "le Boucher" !
description.german: Töte den "Schlächter"!
description.italian: Sconfiggi "Il Macellaio"!
description.japanese: 「ブッチャー」を倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj "Rzeźnika"!
description.spanish: ¡Vence al "Carnicero"!

description.brazilian: Derrote o "Inquisidor"!
description.english: Beat "The Inquisitor"!
description.french: Vainquez "l'Inquisiteur" !
description.german: Töte den "Inquisitor"!
description.italian: Sconfiggi "L'Inquisitore"!
description.japanese: 「インクィジター」を倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj "Inkwizytora"!
description.spanish: ¡Vence al "Inquisidor"!

description.brazilian: Derrote o "Comandante Abandonado"!
description.english: Beat "The Abandoned Commander"!
description.french: Vainquez "le Commandant abandonné" !
description.german: Töte den  "Verstoßenen Kommandanten"!
description.italian: Sconfiggi "Il Comandante Abbandonato"!
description.japanese: 「見捨てられた司令官」を倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj "Porzuconego dowódcę"!
description.spanish: ¡Vence al "Comandante abandonado"!

displayName.german: Schlage der Schlange den Kopf ab

description.brazilian: Derrote o "Estrategista"!
description.english: Beat "The Mastermind"!
description.french: Vainquez "le Cerveau" !
description.german: Töte das "Superhirn"!
description.italian: Sconfiggi "Il Portento"!
description.japanese: 「マスターマインド」を倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj "Mózg operacji"!
description.spanish: ¡Vence a "Mente maestra"!

description.brazilian: Derrote o "Artilheiro" sem levar nenhum golpe!
description.english: Beat "The Gunner" without taking a single hit!
description.french: Vainquez "l'Artilleur" sans vous faire toucher une seule fois !
description.german: Töte den "Kanonier" ohne getroffen zu werden!
description.italian: Sconfiggi "Il Cannoniere" senza ricevere un singolo colpo!
description.japanese: 一度も攻撃を受けずに「ガンナー」を倒す
description.polish: Pokonaj "Strzelca", nie otrzymując ani jednego trafienia!
description.russian: Одолейте Стрелка, не получив ни одного удара!
description.spanish: ¡Vence al "Pistolero" sin recibir ni un golpe!

displayName.russian: Чем они больше, тем громче падают

description.spanish: ¡Vence a "Mente maestra" sin recibir ni un golpe!

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie 10 armas no estante de armas.
description.english: Unlock 10 weapons at the Weapon Rack.
description.french: Déverrouillez 10 armes à l'armurerie.
description.german: Schalte 10 Waffen für den Waffenschrank frei.
description.italian: Sblocca 10 armi nella Rastrelliera.
description.japanese: 武器ラックで10個の武器をアンロックする
description.polish: Odblokuj 10 broni w arsenale
description.russian: Разблокируйте 10 предметов оружия в оружейной стойке.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 10 armas en el arsenal de armas.

description.brazilian: Conclua uma fenda dimensional.
description.english: Complete a Dimensional Rift.
description.french: Terminez une faille dimensionnelle.
description.german: Schließe ein Dimensionsriss erfolgreich ab.
description.italian: Completa una Spaccatura dimensionale.
description.japanese: 次元の裂け目をクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ szczelinę międzywymiarową.
description.spanish: Completa una grieta dimensional.

description.brazilian: Conclua uma fenda dimensional com uma classificação de três estrelas.
description.english: Complete a Dimensional Rift with a three star rating.
description.french: Terminez une faille dimensionnelle avec une note de trois étoiles.
description.german: Schließe ein Dimensionsriss mit einer 3-Sterne-Bewertung ab.
description.italian: Completa una Spaccatura dimensionale con tre stelle.
description.japanese: 次元の裂け目を3つ星でクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ szczelinę międzywymiarową, osiągając trzy gwiazdki.
description.russian: Пройдите разлом с рейтингом в три звезды.
description.schinese: 以3星完成一次空间裂隙
description.spanish: Completa una grieta dimensional con tres estrellas.
description.tchinese: 以3星完成一次空間裂隙
description.turkish: Bir Boyutsal Yarığı üç yıldızla tamamla.

description.brazilian: Use pisoteio para forçar um inimigo voador até uma armadilha para matá-lo!
description.english: Use Stomp to force a flying enemy into a trap to kill it!
description.french: Utilisez le piétinement pour envoyer un ennemi volant dans un piège et le tuer !
description.german: Stoße einen fliegenden Gegner in eine Falle indem du auf seinen Kopf springst und töte ihn dadurch!
description.italian: Usa Calpestamento per uccidere un nemico volante con una trappola!
description.japanese: 飛んでいる敵を踏みつけで罠にはめて倒す
description.koreana: 스톰프로 날아다니는 적을 함정에 빠뜨려 처치했습니다!
description.polish: Zdepcz latającego wroga, aby wpadł w pułapkę i zginął!
description.russian: Используйте умение Топот, чтобы забросить летающего противника в ловушку и убить его!
description.schinese: 使用践踏将飞行敌人踩入尖刺陷阱将其击杀
description.spanish: ¡Usa pisotón para enviar a un enemigo a una trampa y acabar con él!
description.tchinese: 使用踐踏將飛行敵人踩入尖刺陷阱將其擊殺
description.turkish: Ezme ile uçan bir düşmanın, tuzağa düşmesini sağlayarak onu öldür!

description.brazilian: Mate 1.000 inimigos pulando na cabeça deles!
description.english: Kill 1000 enemies by jumping on their heads!
description.french: Tuez 1 000 ennemis en leur sautant sur la tête !
description.german: Töte 1000 Gegner indem du auf sie drauf springst!
description.italian: Uccidi 1.000 nemici saltando sulle loro teste!
description.japanese: 敵の頭の上でジャンプして1000体倒す
description.polish: Zabij 1000 wrogów, skacząc im na głowę!
description.russian: Убейте 1000 противников, прыгнув им на голову!
description.spanish: ¡Acaba con 1000 enemigos saltando sobre su cabeza!

description.brazilian: Aumente o nível da sua árvore de habilidades pela primeira vez.
description.english: Level up your Skill Tree for the first time.
description.french: Faites passer votre arbre de compétences au niveau supérieur pour la première fois.
description.german: Steigere die Stufe deines Skilltrees zum ersten Mal.
description.italian: Aumenta di livello il tuo Albero delle abilità per la prima volta.
description.japanese: スキルツリーを初めてレベルアップさせる
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy podnieś poziom drzewka umiejętności.
description.spanish: Sube de nivel tu árbol de habilidades por primera vez,
description.turkish: Beceri Ağacının seviyesini ilk defa yükselt.

description.brazilian: Maximize todas as habilidades da árvore de habilidades.
description.english: Max out every skill in the Skill Tree.
description.french: Faites passer toutes les compétences au niveau max dans l'arbre de compétences.
description.german: Steigere jede einzelne Fahigkeit des Skilltrees bis zum Maximum.
description.italian: Porta al livello massimo tutte le abilità dell'Albero delle abilità.
description.japanese: スキルツリーの全スキルレベルを最大にする
description.koreana: 스킬 트리에서 모든 스킬을 최대로 올렸습니다.
description.polish: Osiągnij maksymalny poziom każdej umiejętności w drzewku.
description.russian: Доведите до максимума каждое умение в древе умений.
description.schinese: 将技能树中的所有技能升满
description.spanish: Sube al máximo cada habilidad del árbol de habilidades.
description.tchinese: 將技能樹中的所有技能升滿
description.turkish: Beceri Ağacındaki tüm becerileri maksimum seviyeye yükselt.

description.brazilian: Encontre a sala secreta que lhe dá o poder de empunhar armas eternas.
description.english: Find the secret room that gives you the power to wield eternity weapons.
description.french: Trouvez la salle secrète qui vous donne le pouvoir de manier les armes d'éternité.
description.german: Finde den geheimen Raum, der dir die Fähigkeit verleiht, Ewigkeits-Waffen zu benutzen.
description.italian: Trova la stanza segreta che ti conferisce il potere di brandire le armi dell'Eternità.
description.japanese: エタニティ武器が使えるようになる秘密の部屋を見つける
description.koreana: 무한의 총을 사용할 수 있게 해주는 비밀의 방을 발견했습니다.
description.polish: Znajdź tajne pomieszczenie, które daje moc dzierżenia broni wieczności.
description.russian: Найдите тайную комнату, которая дарует вам силу для стрельбы из оружия Вечности.
description.schinese: 找到给予你使用永恒武器能力的秘密房间
description.spanish: Encuentra la sala secreta que te permite usar armas de eternidad.
description.tchinese: 找到給予你使用永恆武器能力的秘密房間
description.turkish: Sonsuzluk silahlarını kullanmanı sağlayan gizli odayı bul.

description.brazilian: Encontre a sala secreta que lhe dá o poder de manejar armas sobrecarregadas.
description.english: Find the secret room that gives you the power to wield overcharged weapons.
description.french: Trouvez la salle secrète qui vous donne le pouvoir de manier les armes surchargées.
description.german: Finde den geheimen Raum, der dir die Fähigkeit verleiht, überladene Waffen zu benutzen.
description.italian: Trova la stanza segreta che ti conferisce il potere di brandire le armi Sovraccariche.
description.japanese: オーバーチャージ武器が使えるようになる秘密の部屋を見つける
description.koreana: 과충전된 무기를 사용할 수 있게 해주는 비밀의 방을 발견했습니다.
description.polish: Znajdź tajne pomieszczenie, które daje moc dzierżenia przeciążonych broni.
description.russian: Найдите тайную комнату, которая дарует вам силу для стрельбы из оружия перезарядки.
description.schinese: 找到给予你使用过载武器能力的秘密房间
description.spanish: Encuentra la sala secreta que te permite usar armas de sobrecarga.
description.tchinese: 找到給予你使用超載武器能力的秘密房間
description.turkish: Aşırı yüklenmiş silahları kullanmanı sağlayan gizli odayı bul.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Torre da Eternidade por meio do console.
description.english: Unlock the Eternity Tower through the console.
description.french: Déverrouillez la tour d'éternité via la console.
description.german: Schalte den Turm der Ewigkeit über die Konsole frei.
description.italian: Sblocca la Torre dell'Eternità tramite la Console.
description.japanese: コンソールからエタニティタワーのロックを解除する
description.polish: Odblokuj Wieżę Wieczności za pomocą konsoli.
description.schinese: 通过终端解锁永恒之塔
description.spanish: Desbloquea la torre de eternidad usando la consola.
description.tchinese: 通過終端解鎖永恆之塔
description.turkish: Konsol aracılığıyla Sonsuzluk Kulesinin kilidini aç.

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo fácil do andar Eternidade.
description.english: Clear the Eternity Stage Mode(Easy).
description.french: Terminez le mode étapes d'éternité (facile).
description.german: Schließe den Ewigkeits-Herausforderungs-Modus auf "Leicht" ab.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Piano dell'Eternità (facile).
description.japanese: エタニティステージモード（イージー）をクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ tryb etapu wieczności (łatwy).
description.russian: Пройдите этап в режиме Вечность (легкий уровень).
description.schinese: 通关永恒关卡模式(简单)
description.spanish: Completa el modo Eternidad (fácil).
description.tchinese: 通關永恆關卡模式(簡單)

description.brazilian: Conclua o modo difícil do andar Eternidade.
description.english: Clear the Eternity Stage Mode(Hard).
description.french: Terminez le mode étapes d'éternité (difficile).
description.german: Schließe den Ewigkeits-Herausforderungs-Modus auf "Schwer" ab.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Piano dell'Eternità (difficile).
description.japanese: エタニティステージモード（ハード）をクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ tryb etapu wieczności (trudny).
description.russian: Пройдите этап в режиме Вечность (сложный уровень).
description.schinese: 通关永恒关卡模式(困难)
description.spanish: Completa el modo Eternidad (difícil).
description.tchinese: 通關永恆關卡模式(困難)

description.brazilian: Mate 100 inimigos de elite.
description.english: Kill 100 elite enemies.
description.french: Tuez 100 ennemis d'élite.
description.german: Töte 100 Elite-Gegner.
description.italian: Uccidi 100 nemici d'élite.
description.japanese: エリート敵を100体倒す
description.polish: Zabij 100 elitarnych wrogów.
description.spanish: Acaba con 100 enemigos de élite.

description.brazilian: Conclua um jogo sem usar nenhuma outra arma exceto a pistola!
description.english: Clear a run using no other weapon than the pistol!
description.french: Terminez une tentative avec le pistolet pour seule arme !
description.german: Schließe einen Durchgang ab und benutze ausschließlich die Pistole!
description.italian: Completa un round usando soltanto una pistola!
description.japanese: ピストル以外の武器を使用せずにクリアする
description.koreana: 권총 외의 다른 무기를 사용하지 않고 한 세션을 완료했습니다!
description.polish: Ukończ podejście, używając jako broni wyłącznie pistoletu!
description.spanish: ¡Completa una partida usando solo la pistola!
description.turkish: Bir oyunu tabanca dışında hiçbir silah kullanmadan bitir!

description.brazilian: Melhore todas as classes ao máximo.
description.english: Upgrade all the classes to their maximum.
description.french: Améliorez toutes les classes au maximum.
description.german: Werte alle Klassen bis zu deren Maximum auf.
description.italian: Migliora al massimo tutte le classi.
description.japanese: 全クラスを最大までアップグレードする
description.polish: Ulepsz maksymalnie wszystkie klasy.
description.schinese: 将所有职业升到最高级
description.spanish: Mejora todas las clases al máximo.
description.tchinese: 將所有職業升到最高級

description.brazilian: Faça um longo passeio de tirolesa!
description.english: Make a long zip line ride!
description.french: Faites une longue descente en tyrolienne !
description.german: Mache eine lange Fahrt mit der Seilbahn!
description.italian: Usa una teleferica lunga!
description.japanese: 長いジップラインを渡る
description.polish: Pokonaj tyrolką duży dystans!
description.spanish: ¡Haz un largo viaje en tirolina!
description.turkish: Uzun bir çelik halat yolculuğu gerçekleştir!

description.brazilian: Abra um baú do tempo.
description.english: Open a Time Chest.
description.french: Ouvrez un coffre du temps.
description.german: Öffne eine Zeitkiste.
description.italian: Apri un Forziere del tempo.
description.japanese: タイムチェストを開ける
description.polish: Otwórz ograniczoną czasowo skrzynię.
description.spanish: Abre un cofre temporal.

description.brazilian: Mate 100 rastejantes com o "lança-chamas"
description.english: Kill 100 Crawler with the "Flamethrower"
description.french: Tuez 100 rampants à l'aide du "lance-flammes".
description.german: Töte 100 Crawler mit dem "Flammenwerfer"
description.italian: Uccidi 100 Granchietti con il "Lanciafiamme".
description.japanese: 「火炎放射器」でクローラーを100体倒す
description.polish: Zabij 100 pełzaczy "miotaczem ognia".
description.schinese: 使用"火焰喷射器"杀死100个爬行者
description.spanish: Acaba con 100 insectos con el "lanzallamas"
description.tchinese: 使用"火焰噴射器"殺死100個爬行者

description.brazilian: Mate 100 inimigos com dano passivo (por exemplo, torretas).
description.english: Kill 100 enemies with passive damage (e.g. turrets).
description.french: Tuez 100 ennemis à l'aide de dégâts passifs (ex. tourelles).
description.german: Töte 100 Gegner mit passivem Schaden (z.B. mit dem Geschützturm).
description.italian: Uccidi 100 nemici con danni passivi (ad es. con le torrette).
description.japanese: パッシブダメージを持つ敵（タレットなど）を100体倒す
description.polish: Zabij 100 wrogów obrażeniami pasywnymi (np. wieżyczkami).
description.schinese: 使用被动伤害(比如炮台)杀死100名敌人
description.spanish: Acaba con 100 enemigos usando daño pasivos (como torretas).
description.tchinese: 使用被動傷害(比如炮臺)殺死100名敵人

description.brazilian: Conclua 5 hacks bem-sucedidos.
description.english: Complete 5 successful hacks.
description.french: Réussissez 5 piratages.
description.german: Führe 5 erfolgreiche Hacks durch.
description.italian: Completa con successo 5 hackeraggi.
description.japanese: ハッキングを5回成功させる
description.polish: Ukończ 5 pomyślnych włamań.
description.spanish: Completa con éxito 5 hackeos.

description.brazilian: Ganhe a bolada no caça-níqueis!
description.english: Get the Jackpot at the Slot Machine!
description.french: Faites un jackpot à la machine à sous !
description.german: Gewinn den Jackpot am Spielautomaten!
description.italian: Ottieni il Jackpot alle Slot machine!
description.japanese: スロットマシンで大当たりを出す
description.polish: Zdobądź pulę, grając na automacie!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue el gran premio en la tragaperras!

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie uma arma de ouro.
description.english: Unlock a gold weapon.
description.french: Déverrouillez une arme en or.
description.german: Schalte eine goldene Waffe frei.
description.italian: Sblocca un'arma dorata.
description.japanese: ゴールド武器をアンロックする
description.polish: Odblokuj złotą broń.
description.spanish: Desbloquea un arma dorada.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie e maximize todos os bônus permanentes na estante de armas.
description.english: Unlock and max out all the permanent buffs at the Weapon Rack.
description.french: Déverrouillez et améliorez au maximum tous les buffs à l'armurerie.
description.german: Schalte alle dauerhaften Verstärkungen im Waffenschrank frei und maximiere diese.
description.italian: Sblocca e porta al livello massimo tutti i buff permanenti nella Rastrelliera.
description.japanese: 武器ラックで全ての永続バフを解除し、最大にする
description.koreana: 무기고에서 영구 버프를 모두 해제하고 최대로 올렸습니다.
description.polish: Odblokuj i ulepsz maksymalnie wszystkie trwałe wzmocnienia w arsenale.
description.russian: Разблокируйте и доведите до максимума все вечные положительные эффекты в оружейной стойке.
description.schinese: 在武器架解锁并将所有永久buff升至最高
description.spanish: Desbloquea y maximiza todas las mejores permanentes en arsenal de armas.
description.tchinese: 在武器架解鎖並將所有永久buff升至最高
description.turkish: Silah Rafındaki tüm kalıcı güçlendirmelerin kilidini aç ve bunları en yüksek seviyeye yükselt.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as conquistas!
description.english: Unlock all achievements!
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les succès !
description.german: Schalte alle Errungenschaften frei!
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i traguardi!
description.japanese: 実績を全て解除する
description.polish: Odblokuj wszystkie osiągnięcia!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue todos los logros!

displayName.japanese: ジャングルフィーバー

description.brazilian: Chegue à selva pela primeira vez.
description.english: Reach the Jungle for the first time.
description.french: Atteignez la jungle pour la première fois.
description.german: Erreiche zum ersten Mal den Dschungel.
description.italian: Raggiungi la Giungla per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めてジャングルに到達する
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy dotrzyj do Dżungli.
description.spanish: Llega a la Jungla por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Chegue à base aquática pela primeira vez.
description.english: Reach the Water Base for the first time.
description.french: Atteignez la base aquatique pour la première fois.
description.german: Erreiche zum ersten Mal die Wasser-Basis .
description.italian: Raggiungi la Base acquatica per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて水上基地に到達する
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy dotrzyj do Podwodnej bazy.
description.spanish: Llega a la Base acuática por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Chegue ao matadouro pela primeira vez.
description.english: Reach the Meat Factory for the first time.
description.french: Atteignez l'usine de viande pour la première fois.
description.german: Erreiche zum ersten Mal die Fleischfabrik.
description.italian: Raggiungi lo Stabilimento carni per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて食肉工場に到達する
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy dotrzyj do Zakładu mięsnego.
description.spanish: Llega a la Planta cárnica por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Chegue aos campos de colheita pela primeira vez.
description.english: Reach the Harvest Fields for the first time.
description.french: Atteignez les champs de récolte pour la première fois.
description.german: Erreiche zum ersten Mal die Erntefelder.
description.italian: Raggiungi i Campi del raccolto per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて収穫フィールドに到達する
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy dotrzyj do Pól żniw.
description.spanish: Llega a los Campos de cultivo por primera vez.

displayName.french: Une mine d'or... euh, de débris !
displayName.italian: Montagne di oro, eh... di rottami!
displayName.japanese: 金の塔は… スクラップ！

description.brazilian: Chegue ao ferro-velho pela primeira vez.
description.english: Reach the Scrapyard for the first time.
description.french: Atteignez la casse pour la première fois.
description.german: Erreiche zum ersten Mal den Schrottplatz.
description.italian: Raggiungi la Discarica per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて屑鉄置場に到達する
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy dotrzyj do Złomowiska.
description.spanish: Llega a la Chatarrería por primera vez.

description.brazilian: Chegue à estação espacial Dread Corp pela primeira vez.
description.english: Reach the Dread Corp Space Station for the first time.
description.french: Atteignez la Station spatiale de la Dread Corp pour la première fois.
description.german: Erreiche zum ersten Mal die Dread Corp-Raumstation.
description.italian: Raggiungi la Stazione spaziale Dread Corp per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めてドレッド社の宇宙ステーションに到達する
description.koreana: Dread Corp 우주 정거장에 처음으로 도달했습니다.
description.polish: Po raz pierwszy dotrzyj do Stacji kosmicznej Dread Corp.
description.russian: Впервые доберитесь до космической станции Дред
description.schinese: 首次抵达恐惧集团空间站
description.spanish: Llega a la Estación espacial de Dread Corp por primera vez.
description.tchinese: 首次抵達恐懼集團空間站
description.turkish: Dread Corp Uzay İstasyonuna ilk defa ulaş.

description.brazilian: Mude seu traje.
description.english: Change your outfit.
description.french: Changez votre tenue.
description.german: Ändere dein Aussehen.
description.italian: Cambia i tuoi abiti.
description.japanese: 着せ替えをする
description.polish: Zmień swój strój.
description.spanish: Cambia tu aspecto.

displayName.italian: La quinta volta è quella buona
displayName.spanish: A la quinta va la vencida

description.brazilian: Sobrecarregue 5 habilidades em um único jogo.
description.english: Overcharge 5 skills in a single run.
description.french: Surchargez 5 compétences en une seule tentative.
description.german: Überlade 5 Skills in einem einzigen Durchlauf.
description.italian: Sovraccarica 5 abilità in un singolo round di gioco.
description.japanese: 1回のプレイで5つのスキルをオーバーチャージする
description.polish: Przeciąż 5 umiejętności w jednym podejściu.
description.russian: Перезарядите пять умений за один забег.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏内过载5次技能
description.spanish: Sobrecarga 5 habilidades en una sola partida.
description.tchinese: 在一局遊戲內超載5次技能
description.turkish: Tek bir oyunda 5 beceriyi aşırı yükle.

description.brazilian: Chegue ao andar 150 no modo infinito de Eternidade com a classe Mercenário selecionada.
description.english: Reach stage 150 in the Eternity Endless Mode with the Mercenary class selected.
description.french: Atteignez l'étape 150 dans le mode infini d'éternité avec la classe Mercenaire.
description.german: Erreiche Stufe 150 im Ewigkeits-Endlos-Modus mit der Söldner-Klasse.
description.italian: Raggiungi il 150° piano nella modalità Infinita dell'Eternità con la classe Mercenario.
description.japanese: エタニティ・エンドレスモードでマーセナリークラスを選択し、ステージ150に到達する
description.koreana: 용병 클래스로 영원 무한 모드 스테이지 150에 도달했습니다.
description.polish: Osiągnij 150 etap w trybie nieskończonej wieczności z wybraną klasą najemnika.
description.russian: Доберитесь до этапа 150 в бесконечном режиме Вечность, выбрав класс Наемник.
description.schinese: 使用佣兵在永恒无尽模式中打到150关
description.spanish: Llega a la fase 150 en el modo infinito con la clase mercenario.
description.tchinese: 使用傭兵在永恆無盡模式中打到150關
description.turkish: Seçili Paralı Asker sınıfıyla Sonsuzluk Sonsuz Modunda 150. aşamaya ulaş.
